meanings.definition: A large-scale agricultural operation that produces a high volume of crops or livestock.
meanings.sent1: The superfarms in the valley grow so many fruits and vegetables.
meanings.sent2: The community relies on the superfarms for fresh produce.
meanings.sent3: The superfarms decided to have a dance party to celebrate the harvest.
meanings.sent4: The superfarms stood like giants in the fields, towering over the landscape.
meanings.sent5: Visiting the superfarms felt like stepping into a green paradise.

meanings.definition: To operate a farm on a very large scale, often using advanced technology and methods.
meanings.sent1: The farmers decided to superfarms their land to increase production.
meanings.sent2: They hope to superfarms their operations to meet the growing demand.
meanings.sent3: The animals were amazed to see the farmers superfarms the fields with robots.
meanings.sent4: She wanted to superfarms her farm into a model of efficiency.
meanings.sent5: The decision to superfarms the farm was a game-changer for the business.
